verses.verse: For the Chief Musician; set to the Sheminith. A Psalm of David. Help<WH3467>, Jehovah<WH3068>; For the godly man<WH120> ceaseth<WH1584>; For the faithful<WH539> fail<WH6461> from among the children<WH1121> of men<WH120>.
They speak<WH1696> falsehood<WH7723> every one<WH376> with his neighbor<WH7453>: With flattering<WH2513> lip<WH8193>, and with a double<WH3820> heart<WH3820>, do they speak<WH1696>.
Jehovah <WH3068> will cut off<WH3772> all flattering<WH2513> lips<WH8193>, The tongue<WH3956> that speaketh<WH1696> great things<WH1419>;
Who have said<WH559>, With our tongue<WH3956> will we prevail<WH1396>; Our lips<WH8193> are our own<WH113>: Who is lord over us?

Because of the oppression<WH7701> of the poor<WH6041>, because of the sighing<WH603> of the needy<WH34>, Now will I arise<WH6965>, saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068>; I will set<WH7896> him in the safety<WH3468> he panteth for<WH6315>.
The words<WH565> of Jehovah<WH3068> are pure<WH2889> words<WH565>; As silver<WH3701> tried<WH6884> in a furnace<WH5948> on the earth<WH776>, Purified<WH2212> seven times<WH7659>.
Thou wilt keep<WH8104> them<WH3068>, O Jehovah, Thou wilt preserve<WH5341> them from this<WH2098> generation<WH1755> for ever<WH5769>.
The wicked<WH7563> walk<WH1980> on every side<WH5439>, When vileness<WH2149> is exalted<WH7311> among the sons of men<WH1121>.
